chapters.title: Chapter 23: Ornaments
chapters.info: Lord Algarin Pendaloan, p. 528 (637)—Lesser Lord of the Land in Tear. He has a wrinkly face and a white beard. He provided accomodations for Rand, Min, Verin, Cadsuane, Lan, Nynaeve, and the rest of their group on his manor so they could recuperate from the events at Shadar Logoth. His younger brother Emarin could channel, and Algarin wants to be tested for the ability now as well. See also Pendaloan, Emarin.
